name: Keep Away (8bit-confusion)
description:
Fight to keep your half of the game field clear of bullets in this fast paced, 1 on 1 game. The less bullets you have stored as ammo or on your side of the field, the more points you get! Battle it out over as many rounds as you want, increasing your score each time and striving to best your opponent.

  • Local multiplayer (no single player mode)
  • Supports controller
